data.eml:eml: Two new cichild species Neolamprologus (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Tanganyika, East Africa

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Verburg, Piet, Bills, Roger (2007): Two new cichild species Neolamprologus (Teleostei: Cichlidae) from Lake Tanganyika, East Africa. Zootaxa 1612: 25-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178953
